events.comment: at the beginning, store all key letters inside structure variables and set pick_new_key = 1
play the sound once at volume 0 only to preload it
if pick_new_key = 1, pick a random key letter, after go through all key objects and find the key and change it animation to be highlighted
if the key highlighted is pressed, change the animation of all keys back to normal and set pick_new_key = 1 to pick a new random key
if the key highlightes is clicked or touched with the mouse, change the animation beck to normal and set pick_new_key = 1
after 60 seconds, go to game over screen
Display the message how many keys have been pressed
